summary:
Literary translator, editor, and university lecturer based in The Hague, The Netherlands. Services include translation of fiction, non-fiction, children's literature and academic texts from Dutch to English; translation of academic and creative texts from Dutch/French/German to English; and English writing and editing services. I also teach academic writing, translation, editing and communication courses at Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam.

Originally from South Carolina, USA, I hold an MA in Language Science and Communication from the University of Lausanne, Switzerland with a specialization in literary translation and a BA in Media Communication, French and German from the College of Charleston.
